GR13todaltiu:150: ṛcaṃ ca trir japet sudhīḥ ToT_4.26d
GR13todaltiu:199: oṃ dhyāyennityaṃ maheśaṃ rajatagirinibhaṃ cārucandrāvataṃsaṃ ToT_5.17c
GR13todaltiu:671: nādaṃ ca vaktraṃ bhālaṃ ca ToT_6.30c
GR13todaltiu:734: padmāsīnaṃ samantāt stutam amaragaṇair vyāghrakṛttiṃ vasānaṃ ToT_5.17e
GR13todaltiu:1141: yā yā śaktiḥ sthitā sadā ToT_7.24b
GR13todaltiu:1277: viśvādyaṃ viśvabījaṃ nikhilabhayaharaṃ pañcavaktraṃ trinetram ToT_5.17f
GR13todaltiu:1406: sa eva tasyā bhartā ca ToT_1.20a
GR13todaltiu:1410: sa guruṃ cāpi śiṣyaṃ ca ToT_5.36c
